title: #93a: Noobs (Kevin Heffernan, Steve Lemme, Ari Shaffir)
itunes:title: Noobs with Kevin Heffernan & Steve Lemme - Part 1
description: Steve Lemme had Kevin Heffernan and I over to his house so we could all talk about what it's like starting standup comedy. I've been wanting to talk to somebody about it for a long time, but those comics are usually so new that they aren't quite funny enough. Lemme and Heffernan have been funny for over a decade already. We talked about learning the art form, dealing with drunks, and Christmas.
